column1: '''Ivorwen''' was the wife of [[Dírhael]] and mother to [[Gilraen]].

column2: Arathorn]] son of [[Arador]] sought [[Gilraen]]'s hand in marriage, Dírhael opposed him. Ivorwen, though, who was said to have the gift of foresight, persuaded her husband to allow the marriage. This was a small part to play in the history of [[Middle-earth]], but it had great consequences - the son of Arathorn and Gilraen was [[Aragorn]], who would one day reunite the ancient [[Kingdoms of the Dúnedain]].<ref>{{App
